title: Cannot import name 'metamap' from 'medacy.pipeline_components'
body:
#### Description

I have this exception when I try to import MetaMap, could you help me fix this bug

#### Steps/Code to Reproduce
from medacy.data import Dataset
from medacy.pipeline_components import metamap
dataset = Dataset('/home/predimed/Documents/NER/data/corpus')
for data_file in dataset:
  print(data_file.file_name)
print(data)
print(data.is_metamapped())

#metamap = Metamap('/home/predimed/Documents/NER/tools/public_mm/bin/')
data.metamap(metamap)
print(data.is_metamapped())

#### Expected Results

file_one
file_two
['file_one.txt', 'file_two.txt']
False
True

#### Actual Results
ImportError                               Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-2-c61ba796da32> in <module>
      1 from medacy.data import Dataset
----> 2 from medacy.pipeline_components import metamap
      3 dataset = Dataset('/home/predimed/Documents/NER/data/corpus')
      4 for data_file in dataset:
      5   print(data_file.file_name)

ImportError: cannot import name 'metamap' from 'medacy.pipeline_components' (/home/predimed/.local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/medacy/pipeline_components/__init__.py)

#### Versions
Linux-4.19.0-6-amd64-x86_64-with-debian-10.1
Python 3.7.4
NumPy 1.16.1
SciPy 1.3.1
medacy 0.2.0
